concept.title: Restore a Named View
concept.shortdesc: With the -VIEW Restore, you can restore a named view to the current view. Named views can be used to do the following:

ul.li: Restore views on the model space viewport or layout viewport.
Specify the area to the plot.
Determined which model space view is displayed when opening the drawing.

conbody.p: You can specify a layout view when you open the drawing only if you save the drawing from that specified layout tab.
